name: Cat Rescue (v1.4.4)
description:
This is a game where you have to walk around a small town, and find five cats so that you can rescue them! It's fairly short. And, crucially, it has cats in it.

I made this funky little experience for a school project a few years ago, and it is my most complete game that I've made to date. It's definitely rough around the edges, but I'm fairly proud of it! I hope to make an improved version someday down the line, but in the meantime, this is the game in its original form.

For more information about the game, including how to play, please see the text documents included with the game's files. And, good luck~!
